item.title: Freeswitch :: Wateen Update
item.description: Just a quick update , anthm @ freeswitch.org has fixed the bug in freeswitch that was preventing the switch to register with Wateenâ€™s gateway. So , go , grab the latest freeswitch code from svn and compile. Here are the settings for your sip_profile _ðŸ™‚ Have fun! and drop a comment if this post was helpful.

item.title: Freeswitch :: Register-proxy Bug
item.description: While trying to configure wateen sip on my freeswitch install , i encountered a bug , aparently wateen has a broken implementation , they dont have srv records for their domain wateen.net, but their sip server / ims envoirnment seems to be forcing it , in the sip â€“ uri. Hereâ€™s exactly whats broken Working â€“ Eyebeam REGISTER sip:wateen.net SIP/2.0 To: Wateen Usersip:[021xxxxx@wateen.net][1] From: Wateen Usersip:[021xxxxx@wateen.net][1];tag=90298206 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP 192.168.1.51:6473;branch=z9hG4bK-d87543-704653288-1â€“d87543-;rport Call-ID: 3736784a1d468701

item.title: Howto Use Wateen on Your Softphone
item.description: Hereâ€™s the info on howto use your wateen number on your softphone from anywhere in the world! User name: 051800XXXX Authorization User: 051800XXXX@wateen.com** Domain:** wateen.com **Proxy:** 58.27.240.22:9060 You can get the Wateen user name from support@wateen.com
